header.title: CosTransactions_SubtransactionAwareResource

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosTransactions::SubtransactionAwareResource interface.

description.p: This interface inherits the CosTransactions::Resource interface. Hence, it must also support all operations defined in the Resource interface.

To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosTransactions/include/CosTransactions.hrl").

func.name: commit_subtransaction(SubtransactionAwareResource, Coordinator) -> Return
func.fsummary: Notify the target object that the transaction has committed

note.p: The results of a committed subtransaction are relative to the completion of its ancestor transactions, that is, these results can be undone if any ancestor transaction is rolled back.

func.name: rollback_subtransaction(SubtransactionAwareResource) -> Return
func.fsummary: Notify the target object that the transaction has been rolled back

desc.p: If the SubtransactionAwareResource have been registered with a transactions using the operation CosTransactions_Coordinator:register_subtran_aware/2 it will be notified when the transaction has rolled back.
